FuncDef:
The lacp alarm-control link-failure command enables LACP alarm control.
The undo lacp alarm-control link-failure command disables LACP alarm control. The lacp alarm-control link-failure command enables LACP alarm control. The undo lacp alarm-control link-failure command disables LACP alarm control. By default, LACP alarm control is disabled.
ExtraInfo: A device reports an LACP alarm if its Eth-Trunk service in LACP mode fails. To prevent the device from frequently reporting such alarms, run the lacp alarm-control link-failure command to enable LACP alarm control. After this function is enabled, the device reports hwLacpNegotiateFailed, hwLacpPartialLinkLoss, hwLacpTotalLinkLoss, hwLacpStateDown, or Eth-Trunk linkdown alarms only when LACP negotiation fails due to the following reasons:
